actions.description: The korred makes two Greatclub or Rock attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, or 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.
actions.name: Greatclub

actions.description: 9 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, or 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.
actions.name: Rock

actions.description:
The korred casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: commune with nature (as an action), meld into stone, stone shape

1/day each: Otto's irresistible dance
actions.name: Spellcasting

name: Korred [MoM]
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: The korred has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.
specialTraits.name: Stone Camouflage
